title: Montreux
summary: Montreux (UK: /mɒ̃ˈtrɜː/,[3] US: /mɒ̃ˈtroʊ/,[4] French: [mɔ̃tʁø] (listen); Arpitan: Montrolx) is a municipality and a Swiss town on the shoreline of Lake Geneva at the foot of the Alps. It belongs to the district of Riviera-Pays-d'Enhaut in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland and has a population of approximately 26,433, and about 85,000 in the agglomeration Vevey-Montreux as 2019.
